item.description:
Come hang out for a casual night in Harvard Square!  We will start at Om for meet and greet, and from there we will head around the corner to redline to dance the night away!! Feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: Come hang out at Om Restaurant and Lounge (92 Winthrop st. in Cambridge) for a bit so we can gather as a group.   Its a trendy venue, so should be nice to relax for a bit with a cool drink menu before a night of dancing!  Around 10, we will head over to Redline (59 JFK st. in Cambridge), which is literally less than a one minute walk around the corner for dancing and hanging out.  Try to get to Om before 10 to ensure you dont miss us, but if you arrive late or can't find the group call or text my cell (508-340-8635).  There should be no cover at Om, but might be at Redline, around $5.

The closest T stop is Harvard, and these venues are located right in the heart of Harvard Square.

And again, these are casual venues.

Hope to see you there!! -Ashley
item.how_to_find_us: My profile picture should give you an idea of who to look for, and my cell is 508-340-8635.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Drinks at Om & Dancing at Redline! - Friday Mar 25
